column4: well i still don't have sound, but modprobe added a driver according to lsmod.  how do i get rid of these drivers that don't work?
i seem to now have the original drivers and the new one, if i am deciphering lsmod correctly
i had the same problem with my wifi card just added the name of the module that i didnt want to load to the blacklist
rmmod to unload the unwanted driver
